item.title: Layered Strawberry Crepe Cake
item.author: Nathan Petersen
item.description: Description This flavor-rich layered strawberry crepe cake is a easy treat for any time of the year. Each slice packs a big punch in the filling department, lending the desert well for sharing with friends. Whether you are looking to treat yourself to a special Saturday morning breakfast or trying to decide what to bring to a potluck, this simple dish will surely have the whole place raving. Who could resist this amazing dish?
